components.name: Affix
components.description: Affix component from FT Design System

components.name: Alert
components.description: Alert content (for composable API)

props.name: banner
props.description: Banner style (full width, no border radius)

components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Alert variant="info" radius="md">
 *   <AlertIcon />
 *   <AlertTitle>Information</AlertTitle>
 *   <AlertDescription>This is an info alert message</AlertDescription>
 *   <AlertAction>
 *     <Button>Action</Button>
 *   </AlertAction>
 *   <AlertClose />
 * </Alert>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Alert variant="info" title="Info" message="Message" action={<Button>Action</Button>} />
 *

components.name: Anchor
components.description: Anchor component from FT Design System

components.name: AppHeader
components.description: AppHeader Component
components.example:
* <AppHeader
 *   size="xl"
 *   device="Desktop"
 *   user={user}
 *   onNotificationClick={handleNotification}
 * />
 *

components.name: Avatar
components.description: Avatar component from FT Design System
components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Avatar size="md" shape="circle">
 *   <AvatarImage src="/avatar.jpg" alt="User" />
 *   <AvatarFallback>JD</AvatarFallback>
 * </Avatar>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Avatar src="/avatar.jpg" alt="User" />
 *

components.name: BackTop
components.description: BackTop component from FT Design System

components.name: Badge
components.description: Badge component props

props.name: count
props.description: Count number or custom React node to display

components.example: * // Simple badge (Shadcn-style) * Active * * // Composable API * * * Active * * * // Badge with count * Notifications * * // Dot badge * * * // With asChild * * Custom Badge * *

components.name: Breadcrumb
components.description: Breadcrumb content (for composable API)

props.name: separator
props.description: Separator icon or element (for declarative API)

components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Breadcrumb>
 *   <BreadcrumbList>
 *     <BreadcrumbItem>
 *       <BreadcrumbLink href="/" icon="home">Home</BreadcrumbLink>
 *     </BreadcrumbItem>
 *     <BreadcrumbSeparator />
 *     <BreadcrumbItem>
 *       <BreadcrumbLink href="/about" isCurrentPage>About</BreadcrumbLink>
 *     </BreadcrumbItem>
 *   </BreadcrumbList>
 * </Breadcrumb>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Breadcrumb items={[{label: 'Home', href: '/'}]} />
 *

components.description: Button variant options

components.description: Buttons array (for declarative API)

components.name: Carousel
components.description: Carousel component from FT Design System

components.name: Cascader
components.description: label?: string;

props.name: changeOnSelect
props.description: Change on select (not just leaf nodes)

components.example:
* <Cascader>
 *   <CascaderOption value="usa" label="United States">
 *     <CascaderOption value="california" label="California">
 *       <CascaderOption value="san-francisco" label="San Francisco" />
 *       <CascaderOption value="los-angeles" label="Los Angeles" />
 *     </CascaderOption>
 *   </CascaderOption>
 * </Cascader>

components.name: Checkbox
components.description: Checkbox content (for composable API)

props.name: label
props.description: Label text displayed next to checkbox (for declarative API)

props.name: indeterminate
props.description: Indeterminate state (shows minus icon instead of check)

components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Checkbox size="md">
 *   <CheckboxInput checked={isChecked} onChange={handleChange} indeterminate={isIndeterminate} />
 *   <CheckboxLabel>Accept terms and conditions</CheckboxLabel>
 *   <CheckboxHelper>You can change this later</CheckboxHelper>
 * </Checkbox>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Checkbox label="Accept terms" checked={isChecked} onChange={handleChange} />
 *

components.description: Chicklet component from FT Design System

props.name: label
props.description: The text content of the chicklet

props.name: variant
props.description: Whether the chicklet has rounded corners (pill) or rectangular corners

components.name: ColorPicker
components.description: ColorPicker component from FT Design System

components.name: Colors
components.description: Colors component from FT Design System

components.name: Content
components.description: Content component from FT Design System

props.name: type
props.description: Content type - only "Text" variant as shown in Figma

components.name: DataEntryTable
components.description: Columns configuration (for declarative API)
components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <DataEntryTable selectable resizable>
 *   <DataEntryTableHeader>
 *     <DataEntryTableHeaderRow>
 *       <DataEntryTableHeaderCell columnKey="name">Name</DataEntryTableHeaderCell>
 *     </DataEntryTableHeaderRow>
 *   </DataEntryTableHeader>
 *   <DataEntryTableBody>
 *     <DataEntryTableRow rowId="1">
 *       <DataEntryTableRowCell rowId="1" columnKey="name" type="input" value="John" />
 *     </DataEntryTableRow>
 *   </DataEntryTableBody>
 * </DataEntryTable>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <DataEntryTable
 *   columns={columns}
 *   data={data}
 *   onCellChange={handleCellChange}
 * />
 *

components.name: DatePicker
components.description: DatePicker component props

props.name: label
props.description: Label text displayed above or beside the input (for declarative API)

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text when no date is selected

props.name: startValue
props.description: Start date value for range picker (ISO string)

props.name: endValue
props.description: End date value for range picker (ISO string)

components.name: Descriptions
components.description: Title for declarative API (deprecated)
components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Descriptions bordered column={2}>
 *   <DescriptionsTitle>User Details</DescriptionsTitle>
 *   <DescriptionsExtra>
 *     <Button size="sm">Edit</Button>
 *   </DescriptionsExtra>
 *   <DescriptionsItem span={2}>
 *     <DescriptionsLabel>Name</DescriptionsLabel>
 *     <DescriptionsValue>John Doe</DescriptionsValue>
 *   </DescriptionsItem>
 * </Descriptions>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Descriptions items={[{label: 'Name', children: 'John Doe'}]} />
 *

components.name: DisplayBlock
components.description: DisplayBlock component from FT Design System

components.name: Divider
components.description: The type of divider to display

props.name: type
props.description: The type of divider to display

props.name: label
props.description: Label to display in the middle of the divider (only for type='with-label')

props.name: plain
props.description: Whether to be a normal text without line if plain

components.example:
* <Divider type="primary" />
 * <Divider type="with-label" label="Section" />
 * <Divider direction="vertical" />
 *

components.name: Drawer
components.description: Drawer placement position

props.name: onOpenChange
props.description: Callback when drawer open state changes

props.name: title
props.description: Drawer title displayed in header (for declarative API)

props.name: placement
props.description: Side from which drawer slides in

props.name: maskClosable
props.description: Allow closing drawer by clicking the backdrop/mask

props.name: footer
props.description: Footer content (typically action buttons) (for declarative API)

components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended) * * * * * * * Settings * * * *

Drawer content goes here

* * * * * * * * // Declarative API (deprecated) * setOpen(false)} * title="Settings" * placement="right" * width={400} * footer={} * > *

Drawer content goes here

* *

components.name: Dropdown
components.description: Options array (for declarative API)
components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Dropdown value={selectedValue} onChange={setValue}>
 *   <DropdownTrigger />
 *   <DropdownContent />
 * </Dropdown>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Dropdown
 *   options={options}
 *   value={selectedValue}
 *   onChange={setValue}
 *   placeholder="Select an option"
 * />
 *

components.name: DropdownMenu
components.description: DropdownMenu component from FT Design System
components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <DropdownMenu property="search">
 *   <DropdownMenuSearch />
 *   <DropdownMenuList>
 *     <DropdownMenuItem value="1">Option 1</DropdownMenuItem>
 *     <DropdownMenuSeparator />
 *     <DropdownMenuItem value="2">Option 2</DropdownMenuItem>
 *   </DropdownMenuList>
 * </DropdownMenu>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <DropdownMenu
 *   property="default"
 *   options={options}
 *   onSelect={handleSelect}
 * />
 *

components.name: Empty
components.description: description?: React.ReactNode;
components.example:

 *   <Button>Add Item</Button>
 * </Empty>
 *

components.name: FilterDateRange
components.description: Unique identifier for this filter (used for context management)

props.name: id
props.description: Unique identifier for this filter (used for context management)

components.name: FilterDropdown
components.description: Unique identifier for this filter (used for context management)

props.name: id
props.description: Unique identifier for this filter (used for context management)

props.name: icon
props.description: Icon name for mobile icon button

components.name: FilterSearch
components.description: Search value

components.name: FloatButton
components.description: FloatButton component from FT Design System

components.name: Footer
components.description: Number of buttons to display (1-4) - for declarative API

props.name: buttonCount
props.description: Number of buttons to display (1-4) - for declarative API

props.name: leftSideButton
props.description: Whether to show the left side button (only for 3+ button layouts) - for declarative API

props.name: buttonTexts
props.description: Custom button texts - if not provided, defaults to "Button" - for declarative API

props.name: buttonVariants
props.description: Custom button variants for each button - for declarative API

props.name: onButtonClick
props.description: Custom click handlers for each button - for declarative API

components.example:
* <Footer>
 *   <FooterButton variant="secondary">Cancel</FooterButton>
 *   <FooterButton variant="primary">Save</FooterButton>
 * </Footer>
 *

components.name: Form
components.description: layout?: FormLayout;

props.name: labelCol
props.description: Label column span (1-24) for horizontal layout

props.name: wrapperCol
props.description: Wrapper column span (1-24) for horizontal layout

props.name: onFinish
props.description: Called when form is submitted with valid values

props.name: onFinishFailed
props.description: Called when form submission fails validation

props.name: onValuesChange
props.type: (changedValues: Record<string, any>, allValues: Record<string, any>) => void
props.description: Called when any field value changes

components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Form>
 *   <FormItem name="email">
 *     <FormLabel mandatory>Email</FormLabel>
 *     <FormControl>
 *       <Input type="email" />
 *     </FormControl>
 *     <FormError>Invalid email</FormError>
 *     <FormHelper>We'll never share your email</FormHelper>
 *   </FormItem>
 * </Form>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <FormItem name="email" label="Email" required>
 *   <Input type="email" />
 * </FormItem>
 *

components.description: Illustration component from FT Design System

components.name: Image
components.description: Image component from FT Design System

props.name: onError
props.description: Callback when image fails to load

components.name: Input
components.description: Input component props

props.name: label
props.description: Label text displayed above the input

props.name: labelMandatory
props.description: Shows mandatory indicator (*) next to label

props.name: labelOptional
props.description: Shows optional indicator next to label

components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Input size="md" variant="default">
 *   <InputLabel mandatory>Email</InputLabel>
 *   <InputField type="email" leadingIcon="mail" placeholder="Enter email" />
 *   <InputError>Invalid email</InputError>
 * </Input>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Input label="Email" type="email" placeholder="Enter your email" />
 *

components.name: InputNumber
components.description: Current value (controlled)
components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <InputNumber value={10} min={0} max={100} step={1}>
 *   <InputNumberWrapper>
 *     <InputNumberPrefix>$</InputNumberPrefix>
 *     <InputNumberField />
 *     <InputNumberSuffix>USD</InputNumberSuffix>
 *     <InputNumberControls />
 *   </InputNumberWrapper>
 * </InputNumber>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <InputNumber value={10} prefix="$" suffix="USD" />
 *

components.name: Label
components.description: Label component from FT Design System

props.name: mandatory
props.description: Whether the field is mandatory (shows red asterisk)

props.name: optional
props.description: Whether the field is optional (shows "(Optional)" text)

props.name: suffixIcon
props.description: Whether to show a suffix icon (info/alert icon)

props.name: icon
props.description: Custom icon to use instead of default AlertTriangle

props.name: htmlFor
props.description: HTML attributes for the label element

components.name: List
components.description: Data source for declarative API (deprecated)
components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended) * * * List Header * * * * * * * * Item Title * Item description * * * * * * * * * * * * // Declarative API (deprecated) *
{item.name}
} /> *

components.description: value?: number;
components.example:
* <Loader value={50} showLogo={true} />
 *

components.example:

components.description: Message component from FT Design System

components.name: Modal
components.description: Modal component props

props.name: onOpenChange
props.description: Callback when modal open state changes

props.name: title
props.description: Modal title displayed in header (for declarative API)

props.name: footer
props.description: Footer content (typically action buttons) (for declarative API)

props.name: maskClosable
props.description: Allow closing modal by clicking the backdrop/mask

Modal content goes here

Are you sure you want to proceed?

components.name: NavigationMenu
components.description: NavigationMenu component from FT Design System

components.name: NavigationPopover
components.description: Sections array (for declarative API)
components.example:
* <NavigationPopover>
 *   <NavigationSection id="overview" label="Overview" icon="dashboard">
 *     <NavigationSectionHero title="Overview" description="High-level summary" />
 *     <NavigationSectionMetric variant="highlight" title="Key Metrics" description="Monitor performance" />
 *   </NavigationSection>
 * </NavigationPopover>
 *

components.name: Notification
components.description: Notification component from FT Design System

components.name: PageHeader
components.description: PageHeader component from FT Design System
components.example:
* <PageHeader>
 *   <PageHeader.Top>
 *     <PageHeader.Left>
 *       <PageHeader.BackButton />
 *       <PageHeader.Title>Page Title</PageHeader.Title>
 *     </PageHeader.Left>
 *     <PageHeader.Right>
 *       <PageHeader.Actions>
 *         <Button>Action</Button>
 *       </PageHeader.Actions>
 *     </PageHeader.Right>
 *   </PageHeader.Top>
 *   <PageHeader.Bottom>
 *     <PageHeader.Tabs value={activeTab} onValueChange={setActiveTab}>
 *       <PageHeader.Tabs.List>
 *         <PageHeader.Tabs.Trigger value="tracking">Tracking</PageHeader.Tabs.Trigger>
 *         <PageHeader.Tabs.Trigger value="loads">Loads</PageHeader.Tabs.Trigger>
 *       </PageHeader.Tabs.List>
 *     </PageHeader.Tabs>
 *   </PageHeader.Bottom>
 * </PageHeader>
 *

components.name: PageHeaderFilters
components.description: Filter components (FilterDropdown, FilterDateRange, FilterSearch)
components.example:
* <PageHeaderFilters primaryAction={{ label: 'Add Journey', icon: 'add', onClick: handleAdd }}>
 *   <FilterDropdown id="location" ... />
 *   <FilterDateRange id="dates" ... />
 *   <FilterSearch ... />
 * </PageHeaderFilters>
 *

components.name: Pagination
components.description: Pagination content (for composable API)
components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Pagination current={1} total={100} pageSize={10}>
 *   <PaginationList>
 *     <PaginationPrevious />
 *     <PaginationItem page={1} />
 *     <PaginationEllipsis />
 *     <PaginationItem page={5} />
 *     <PaginationNext />
 *   </PaginationList>
 * </Pagination>
 * 
 * // Compact variant
 * <Pagination 
 *   current={1} 
 *   total={100} 
 *   pageSize={10}
 *   variant="compact"
 *   onChange={(page) => handlePageChange(page)}
 * />
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Pagination current={1} total={100} onChange={handleChange} />
 *

components.name: Popconfirm
components.description: Title text (for declarative API)
components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Popconfirm onConfirm={handleConfirm} placement="top">
 *   <PopconfirmTrigger>
 *     <Button>Delete</Button>
 *   </PopconfirmTrigger>
 *   <PopconfirmContent>
 *     <PopconfirmIcon />
 *     <PopconfirmTitle>Are you sure?</PopconfirmTitle>
 *     <PopconfirmDescription>This action cannot be undone.</PopconfirmDescription>
 *     <PopconfirmActions />
 *     <PopconfirmArrow />
 *   </PopconfirmContent>
 * </Popconfirm>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Popconfirm
 *   title="Are you sure?"
 *   description="This action cannot be undone."
 *   onConfirm={handleConfirm}
 * >
 *   <Button>Delete</Button>
 * </Popconfirm>
 *

components.name: ProgressBar
components.description: ProgressBar component from FT Design System

props.name: type
props.description: NEW: Progress type - line, circle, or dashboard

components.name: ProgressList
components.description: Items array (for declarative API)
components.example:
* <ProgressList showTime>
 *   <ProgressListItem
 *     id="1"
 *     title="Step 1"
 *     description="Description"
 *     state="completed"
 *     pointType="primary"
 *   />
 *   <ProgressListItem
 *     id="2"
 *     title="Step 2"
 *     state="current"
 *     pointType="primary"
 *   />
 * </ProgressList>
 *

components.name: QuickFilters
components.description: Filters array (for declarative API)
components.example:
* <QuickFilters onFilterClick={handleClick}>
 *   <QuickFilter id="all" label="All Items" />
 *   <QuickFilter id="active" label="Active" count={12} />
 *   <QuickFilter id="status" label="Status">
 *     <FilterOption id="active" label="Active" count={12} />
 *     <FilterOption id="pending" label="Pending" count={5} />
 *   </QuickFilter>
 * </QuickFilters>
 *

components.name: RadioGroup
components.description: Radio group name (required for form submission)

props.name: name
props.description: Radio group name (required for form submission)

props.name: onValueChange
props.description: Callback when value changes (alias for onChange)

components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <RadioGroup name="choice" value={value} onValueChange={setValue} size="md">
 *   <RadioGroupLabel>Select an option</RadioGroupLabel>
 *   <RadioItem value="option1">
 *     <RadioItemInput />
 *     <RadioItemLabel>Option 1</RadioItemLabel>
 *   </RadioItem>
 *   <RadioItem value="option2">
 *     <RadioItemInput />
 *     <RadioItemLabel>Option 2</RadioItemLabel>
 *   </RadioItem>
 *   <RadioGroupError>Please select an option</RadioGroupError>
 * </RadioGroup>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <RadioGroup name="choice" options={options} value={value} onChange={setValue} />
 *

components.name: RadioSelector
components.description: Options array (for declarative API)
components.example:
* <RadioSelector name="choice" value={value} onChange={setValue}>
 *   <RadioSelectorOption value="option1" header="Option 1" description="Description 1" />
 *   <RadioSelectorOption value="option2" header="Option 2" description="Description 2" icon={<Icon name="check" />} />
 * </RadioSelector>
 *

components.name: Rate
components.description: Current value (controlled)
components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Rate value={3} count={5} size="md">
 *   {Array.from({ length: 5 }, (_, i) => (
 *     <RateItem key={i} index={i}>
 *       <RateIcon index={i} />
 *     </RateItem>
 *   ))}
 * </Rate>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Rate value={3} count={5} />
 *

components.name: Slider
components.description: Current value (single or range) (controlled)

components.name: Spacer
components.description: Size of the spacer

props.name: horizontal
props.description: Whether the spacer is horizontal (width) or vertical (height)

components.example:
* <Spacer size="x4" />

components.name: Spin
components.description: Spin component from FT Design System

props.name: fullscreen
props.description: Whether to use full screen mode

components.name: StackedBarChart
components.description: Chart data (for declarative API)

props.name: maxValue
props.description: Force the maximum value used for scaling (defaults to the largest bar sum)

props.name: barHeight
props.description: Explicit chart height in pixels (default taken from Figma)

components.example:
* <StackedBarChart title="Ageing">
 *   <StackedBarChartBar label="4+ hrs">
 *     <StackedBarChartSegment label="Laxmi Transporters" value={27} />
 *     <StackedBarChartSegment label="Singh Transporters" value={43} />
 *   </StackedBarChartBar>
 * </StackedBarChart>
 *

components.name: Steps
components.description: Steps array for declarative API (deprecated)
components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Steps currentStep={1} device="desktop" direction="horizontal" type="default">
 *   <StepsList>
 *     <StepItem value={1}>
 *       <StepIcon />
 *       <StepContent>
 *         <StepTitle>Step 1</StepTitle>
 *         <StepDescription>Description</StepDescription>
 *       </StepContent>
 *     </StepItem>
 *   </StepsList>
 * </Steps>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Steps steps={[{label: 'Step 1', description: 'Description'}]} currentStep={1} />
 *

components.name: SubText
components.description: SubText component from FT Design System

props.name: icon
props.description: Whether to show the check icon

components.name: Switch
components.description: Switch content (for composable API)

props.name: label
props.description: Label text displayed next to switch (for declarative API)

components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Switch size="md">
 *   <SwitchInput checked={isEnabled} onChange={handleChange} />
 *   <SwitchLabel>Enable notifications</SwitchLabel>
 *   <SwitchHelper>You can change this later</SwitchHelper>
 * </Switch>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Switch label="Enable notifications" checked={isEnabled} onChange={handleChange} />
 *

components.name: Table
components.description: Table column definition

props.name: rowAccessory
props.description: Custom accessory content for each row

props.name: rowActionsLabel
props.description: Label for row actions column header

props.name: emptyMessage
props.description: Message displayed when table is empty

components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended) * * Monthly Sales Data * * * Name * Email * Status * * * * * John Doe * john@example.com * * Active * * * * * * * Total: $1,234.56 * * * *
* * // Declarative API (deprecated) * const columns = [ * { key: 'name', title: 'Name', sortable: true }, * { key: 'email', title: 'Email' }, * { key: 'status', title: 'Status', render: (value) => {value} } * ]; * * const data = [ * { id: 1, name: 'John Doe', email: 'john@example.com', status: 'Active' }, * { id: 2, name: 'Jane Smith', email: 'jane@example.com', status: 'Inactive' } * ]; * * console.log(selected)} * onSort={(column, direction) => console.log(column, direction)} * /> *

components.name: Tabs
components.description: Tabs content (for composable API)

props.name: onTabChange
props.description: Callback when tab changes (for declarative API)

components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Tabs type="primary" showLine>
 *   <TabsList>
 *     <TabsTrigger value="tab1">Tab 1</TabsTrigger>
 *     <TabsTrigger value="tab2">Tab 2</TabsTrigger>
 *   </TabsList>
 *   <TabsContent value="tab1">Content 1</TabsContent>
 *   <TabsContent value="tab2">Content 2</TabsContent>
 * </Tabs>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Tabs tabs={tabs} activeTab={0} onTabChange={handleChange} />
 *

components.name: Text
components.description: Text component from FT Design System

components.name: Textarea
components.description: Textarea content (for composable API)

props.name: label
props.description: Label text displayed above the textarea (for declarative API)

props.name: labelMandatory
props.description: Shows mandatory indicator (*) next to label (for declarative API)

props.name: labelOptional
props.description: Shows optional indicator next to label (for declarative API)

props.name: error
props.description: Error message displayed below textarea (for declarative API)

props.name: helperText
props.description: Helper text displayed below textarea (for declarative API)

components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Textarea size="md">
 *   <TextareaLabel mandatory>Description</TextareaLabel>
 *   <TextareaField rows={6} placeholder="Enter description" />
 *   <TextareaError>Description is required</TextareaError>
 * </Textarea>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Textarea label="Description" rows={4} error="Required" />
 *

components.name: ThemeSwitch
components.description: ThemeSwitch component from FT Design System

components.name: Timeline
components.description: Timeline component from FT Design System

props.name: mode
props.description: Timeline mode - left, right, or alternate

props.name: pending
props.description: Whether the last item is pending

components.name: TimePicker
components.description: TimePicker component from FT Design System

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether the time picker is disabled

props.name: labelSuffixIcon
props.description: Whether to show suffix icon on label

props.name: value
props.description: Time value in HH:mm:ss or HH:mm format

props.name: disabledHours
props.description: Disabled hours (array of hours to disable)

props.name: disabledMinutes
props.description: Disabled minutes (array of minutes to disable for selected hour)

props.name: disabledSeconds
props.description: Disabled seconds (array of seconds to disable for selected hour and minute)

components.name: Toggle
components.description: Toggle Component
components.example:
* <Toggle pressed={isPressed} onPressedChange={setIsPressed}>
 *   Toggle
 * </Toggle>
 *

components.name: ToggleGroup
components.description: ToggleGroup component from FT Design System

components.name: Tooltip
components.description: Tooltip content (for composable API)

props.name: showClose
props.description: Whether to show the close button

props.name: onClose
props.description: Callback when close button is clicked

props.name: primaryActionText
props.description: Primary action button text (for declarative API)

props.name: secondaryActionText
props.description: Secondary action button text (for declarative API)

props.name: align
props.description: Tooltip alignment along the placement edge

components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Tooltip placement="top" align="center" color="white">
 *   <TooltipTrigger>
 *     <Button>Hover me</Button>
 *   </TooltipTrigger>
 *   <TooltipContent>
 *     <TooltipTitle>Tooltip Title</TooltipTitle>
 *     <TooltipDescription>Tooltip description</TooltipDescription>
 *     <TooltipArrow />
 *   </TooltipContent>
 * </Tooltip>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Tooltip heading="Title" primaryActionText="Action">
 *   Content
 * </Tooltip>
 *

components.name: Tour
components.description: Steps array (for declarative API)
components.example:
* <Tour open={open} onClose={() => setOpen(false)}>
 *   <TourStep title="Upload File" target={() => uploadRef.current}>
 *     Put your files here.
 *   </TourStep>
 *   <TourStep title="Save" target={() => saveRef.current}>
 *     Save your changes.
 *   </TourStep>
 * </Tour>
 *

components.name: Transfer
components.description: Data source array (for declarative API)
components.example:
* <Transfer targetKeys={targetKeys} onChange={setTargetKeys}>
 *   <TransferItem key="1" title="Item 1" />
 *   <TransferItem key="2" title="Item 2" />
 *   <TransferItem key="3" title="Item 3" />
 * </Transfer>
 *

components.name: Tree
components.description: Tree data (for declarative API)
components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Tree checkable selectable>
 *   <TreeNode nodeKey="1" title="Node 1">
 *     <TreeNode nodeKey="1-1" title="Child 1" />
 *   </TreeNode>
 * </Tree>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Tree
 *   treeData={treeData}
 *   checkable
 *   onCheck={handleCheck}
 * />
 *

components.description: TreeSelect component from FT Design System

components.name: Typography
components.description: Typography component from FT Design System

components.name: Upload
components.description: Upload type
components.example:
* // Composable API (recommended)
 * <Upload type="drag-drop" maxFiles={5}>
 *   <UploadTrigger />
 *   <UploadList />
 * </Upload>
 * 
 * // Declarative API (deprecated)
 * <Upload
 *   type="button"
 *   maxFiles={10}
 *   onFilesChange={handleFilesChange}
 * />
 *
